name: LisJ2ME-Symbian JAWBT Patch
short_description: Symbian phones like the Nokia 6600 do not support the selectService method of the javax.bluetooth.DiscoveryAgent class( http://www.symbian.com/Developer/techlib/papers/JABWT/JABWT_1_0.pdf ). This patch implements the lacking method in Java.
